about_the_game:
Irritated Mind: Fear of Warehouse is a first-person survival horror game with intense gameplay and a twisted, horrifying storyline.

Immerse yourself in a world of nightmares where two temporal dimensions of game graphics intertwine: retro PSX and modern visual style. This game offers a unique immersion into the era of classic PSX horror, blending it with contemporary horror aesthetics and combining the best features of both styles into one work.

After a mysterious tragedy, you must leave everything behind and start anew in an unfamiliar city. A new job at a gloomy warehouse marks the beginning of your mysterious journey. Fate has prepared a place for you where reality intertwines with puzzles, and mysteries and dangers pervade every corner.

The game offers three gameplay modes: Story Mode, Challenges, and Endless Mode.

FEATURES

  • A complex and tangled story of the main character, filled with numerous dark mysteries.
  • Retro-stylized graphics in narrative parts, adding a special horror and atmosphere to the gameplay. It's a journey into the past, both visually and narratively.
  • The speed of completing tasks in each work shift affects your earnings, so strive for excellent results to maximize your income.
  • A game shop where you can spend your hard-earned money on various upgrades and new devices to help you in the next shift.
  • A variety of game mechanics that make every shift a real challenge.

STORY MODE


The story of this game is a complex and tangled tale where the past holds many dark secrets. With each passing day, new mysteries unfold, which you must gradually uncover on the path to the truth.

You'll face 7 unique night shifts, where each shift is a new trial harboring new threats and dangers, and you must skillfully manage resources to stay alive.

CHALLENGES


Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of challenges, offering unique scenarios that expand the possibilities of the narrative mode's work shifts. Each challenge presents a new exciting gameplay scenario, requiring agility, strategic thinking, and quick reactions from you.

ENDLESS MODE


In this mode, your goal is to survive as long as possible while the game's difficulty increases over time. Compete with other players, aiming to achieve the best result and secure high positions on the leaderboard!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Athlon X4 840
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: After a tragic event, moving to a new city leads you to work in a dark warehouse. Unravel the mysteries surrounding the protagonist's past and survive through 5 shifts, avoiding ruthless enemies, where a convoluted story unfolds in the style of retro-stylized graphics.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
